thread.title: (USA-WA-Auburn) Machined Parts Finisher C
thread.title_full: (USA-WA-Auburn) Machined Parts Finisher C

posts.title: (USA-WA-Auburn) Machined Parts Finisher C
posts.text:
The Boeing Company Machined Parts Finisher C in Auburn , Washington 
Position Description: 
Perform hand finishing operations on machined parts per drawings, specifications, work orders and engineering dispositions using hand and air powered tools. 
Job Responsibilities include: 
Employment in this position also requires handling, use of low impact vibratory tools, lifting and carrying less than 10 pounds, finger manipulation, flexion/extension, rotation of head/neck, standing, twisting at the waist, contact with metals, exposure to noise and atmospheric conditions, and the use of personal safety gear for face/eye, hand/arm, ears and feet. 
Work jobs based on order of priority or as assigned by lead. 
Verify that prior operations have been completed per the work order. 
Review work order instructions for job information and the following operations (e.g., penetrant inspect, shot peen). 
Check parts for obvious defects and ensure quantity and part numbers are correct per work order. 
Work with area lead and/or quality focal to review nonconformance items and/or engineering dispositions to accomplish rework. 
Obtain and review appropriate drawings, specifications and any other necessary documents to perform the job. 
Use on-line information systems, as required. Obtain hand or air powered tools (e.g., files, jitterbug, router, sanders) for the assigned job. 
Hand work part surfaces to break sharp edges, form radii, blend mismatches, lap for flatness or other requirements per drawings, specifications and work order. 
Use precision measurement tools (e.g., micrometer, calipers, profilometer) to verify dimensions and check surface finish per drawing, specification and work order requirements. 
Remove tool tabs from aluminum parts using floor mounted band saw, as required. 
Check work after completion of job to ensure operations are finished per drawing and that there are no obvious visible defects. 
Clean parts and identify by part marking per work order and specifications using appropriate tools (e.g., vibro engraver, dot peen machine, chemical etch), as required. 
Protective wrap parts for transportation per work order and specifications, as required. 
Document completed operations on work order and/or in computer on-line systems. 
Notify lead when job is complete in order to put up for inspection or in-process checks. 
Use pendant controlled overhead cranes and pallet jacks to move parts, as required. 
Handle and dispose of hazardous materials in approved manner. 
Consult with lead, supervisor or others on process or job related issues, as required. 
Maintain personal and tool certifications, as required. 
Boeing is the world's largest aerospace company and leading manufacturer of commercial airplanes and defense, space and security systems. We are engineers and technicians. Skilled scientists and thinkers. Bold innovators and dreamers. Join us, and you can build something better for yourself, for our customers and for the world. 
Current Boeing employees working in Puget Sound and Portland must submit an Employee Request Transfer (ERT) to be considered in the eligible candidate pool. Resumes of current Puget Sound Boeing employees submitted via Careers at Boeing will not be considered. This is an hourly position governed by the IAM Collective Bargaining agreement. High school graduate or GED preferred. 
This position must meet Export Control compliance requirements, therefore a “US Person” as defined by 22 C.F.R. § 120.15 is required. “US Person” includes US Citizen, lawful permanent resident, refugee, or asylee. 
Required Qualifications: 
Experience working with hand and power tools such as drills, sanders, and saws. 
Must be capable of working with and around hazardous materials (while using the proper protective equipment). 
Experience utilizing and following detailed work instructions, machine shop drawings, and reading and interpreting blueprints or drawings. 
Preferred Qualifications: Experience using the following precision measuring equipment: Micrometers, Calipers. 
Job: *Aircraft Manufacturing 
Title: Machined Parts Finisher C 
Location: Washington-Auburn

posts.author: IL SECOLO XIX
posts.title: Gf Vip, il caso Aida-Jeremias e il siparietto hot di Corinne
posts.text:
Trash a palate: urla e risse nella notte fuori dalla Casa 
Genova –Nuovi flirt, presunti baci, segreti inconfessabili, mutande “volanti” e abbracci che hanno messo la parola “fine” ad anni di incomprensioni e litigi. «Sarà una puntata che farà rizzare i capelli in testa», ha anticipato Ilary Blasi in apertura di programma. E cosìè stato: la nona puntata del Grande Fratello Vip non ha deluso le aspettative del pubblico che segue il reality di Canale 5, che quest’anno sta mettendo seriamente in crisi le certezze di alcuni inquilini, tanto che sul Web c’è chi si chiede se la Casa più spiata d’Italia si stia trasformando in Temptation Island , il docu-reality estivo che mette a dura prova le coppie sull’isola delle tentazioni. 
Così dopo aver mollato in diretta tivù, dopo 4 anni, Francesco Monte , Cecilia Rodriguez ha deciso di vivere appieno, alla luce del sole, dinanzi alle telecamere, la sua storia con Ignazio Moser . «E’ stata una settimana molto intensa e piacevole», commenta l’ex ciclista, mentre l’argentina sottolinea di essersi guardata dentro e di aver capito molte cose dentro di sé. A stuzzicarli, da studio, ci pensa Simona Izzo che allude a una possibile messinscena, una strategia: «Mi auguro che vada oltre le telecamere ma Cecilia aveva accusato Luca che tutto era preparato, ora mi sfiora lo stesso sentimento che lei ebbe in quei giorni…», puntualizza la regista nutrendo dunque qualche dubbio sulla loro love-story, difesa invece da Signorini , che non pochi, sul Web, accusano di parteggiare un po’ troppo per i Rodriguez. 
Da un flirt all’altro, in realtà presunto, che vede protagonisti il single Jeremias Rodriguez e la fidanzatissima Aida Yespica , negli ultimi giorni sempre più vicini. Tra loro abbracci, balli sensuali e coccole a letto, come fa notare la Blasi. Che mostra in diretta le immagini di un presunto bacio che l’argentino e la venezuelana si sarebbero scambiati in confessionale, dietro la tenda, sfuggendo alle telecamere. Aida nega: «Non è successo niente», mentre Jeremias, in evidente imbarazzo, ammette di aver provato a baciarla, precisando però che lei si sarebbe sottratta. Al di là del bacio, la loro complicità non è piaciuta al fidanzato della showgirl sudamericana, Giuseppe Lama , che ha espresso tutto il suo disappunto con un biglietto con cui la rimprovera di aver mancato di rispetto a lui e al loro amore. Aida, preoccupata, cerca di rassicurarlo sottolineando ancora una volta che non c’è stato davvero nulla. Ma non tutti le credono, in particolare su Twitter, dove in molto la accusano di negare l’evidenza. Arriva poi il momento dell’esito del televoto: salvi Tonon e Yespica, ad abbandonare la Casa è Corinne Clery , ieri sera protagonista di un siparietto hot che ha mandato in delirio i social: nel momento dell’uscita, infatti, l’attrice francese, forse infastidita dal costume che indossava sotto il vestito, si è sfilata in diretta gli slip, salvo poi riceverne un altro paio da Tonon, accorso in suo aiuto. 
Tra la “sfida delle pance” e la nomina di Tonon capitano della settimana, arrivano nuove nomination, a mo’ di esclusione diretta tra gli inquilini: Giulia De Lellis , rimasta da sola, di fronte a Ignazio Moser e Jeremias Rodriguez è in crisi, non sa chi scegliere. L’argentino, per amore della sorella, si sacrifica e la invita a fare il suo nome : così, tra le lacrime di sua sorella Cecilia e lo stupore degli altri inquilini, Jeremias abbandona la casa . Ma, in realtà, ad avere l’ultima parola è sempre il pubblico da casa che con un televoto flash decide di farlo rientrare per la gioia di tutti. Mentre in studio Corinne, l’ultima eliminata, fa il suo ingresso e finalmente riabbraccia Serena Grandi , sua rivale in amore, in Casa si procede alle nomination, tutti contro tutti. A rischio eliminazione finiscono in cinque: Giulia, Cristiano, Raffaello, Jeremias e Luca.

thread.title_full: (USA-NM-Cannon AFB) Tool Coordinator 2

posts.title: (USA-NM-Cannon AFB) Tool Coordinator 2
posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 2,177,396 ) The Boeing Company Tool Coordinator 2 in Cannon AFB , New Mexico 
RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE: • Supports manufacturing requirements for non-production materials, tool and shop supplies. Assists with analysis and research of new technology. • Assists with investigating changes in manufacturing requirements and supporting emergent requests. • Supports the evaluation of outside supplier performance and verification of compliance with procedures and contract specifications. • Performs inventory and coordinates redistribution of materials. • Works under general supervision. 
Boeing is the world's largest aerospace company and leading manufacturer of commercial airplanes and defense, space and security systems. We are engineers and technicians. Skilled scientists and thinkers. Bold innovators and dreamers. Join us, and you can build something better for yourself, for our customers and for the world. 
This position requires the ability to obtain a US Security Clearance for which the US Government requires US Citizenship. 
TYPICAL EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE: AA degree in related discipline and typically 1 or more years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience. 
BASIC QUALIFICATIONS (REQUIRED): • Ability to obtain a Secret Clearance upon/post hire. • Primarily involved with the daily inventory control (issue and turn-in) of tools, support equipment, consumables, and hazmat that is used by maintenance personnel in repairs, modifications and maintenance of CV-22 aircraft utilizing the TCMAX tool control software program and the government CACRL program. • This includes inventory control of tool and support equipment spares. • Additionally, they perform and document repairs, TCTOs, periodic maintenance and inspections that are required to keep tools and support equipment in serviceable condition; as well as keeping stocks of consumables and hazmat at quantity levels high enough to not impact the mission of maintenance personnel. • As required to replace broken, worn out tools and support equipment; exhausted consumables and hazmat they will forward to the appropriate management the necessary data to replace the needed items in a timely manner. Provides training and mentoring to others, and works under minimal direction. 
DESIRED QUALIFICATIONS: • Knowledge of AFI 21-101/PMEL/working with calibrated tools a plus. 
Job: *Tool Coordinator 
Organization: *Customer Field Mod & Upgrade 
Title: Tool Coordinator 2

公司简介：
2004年，在市场竞争激烈的环境中，嘉保信装饰成立。经过自身的不懈努力，组织架构不断完善，现在已发展成为全产业链覆盖的装饰企业，全面涉及家装、工装、建材三大重要版块。公司自成立以来，一直秉承“诚信为本”的原则，为客户提供系统的装修解决方案，现已成为烟台市装饰装修行业领跑企业，一级装修资质，中国建筑装饰品牌500强企业，烟台装饰协会理事单位，连续9年的“诚信家装企业”，更有2016年烟台电视台知名主持人王术加盟代言，好装修，就找嘉保信的口碑已深入人心。
